name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amazon Prime Video Next Up Remover

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Autoplay setting NEEDS to be turned off as demo Screenshots shows.

This extension removes the "Next Up" icon that appears when a show is ending. It features a toggle switch to enable or disable this functionality, and changes will take effect after refreshing the page.
